alert.note: Alert for Lancaster (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 01 at 2:52PM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT CENTRAL LANCASTER COUNTY THROUGH 315 PM EDT... At 252 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Millersville, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Lancaster around 255 PM EDT. Willow Street around 300 PM EDT. Smithville around 305 PM EDT. Strasburg, Paradise and Bareville around 315 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Smoketown, Christiana, White Horse, Refton and Intercourse. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
